recipe.title: Vegetable Broth
ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed chopped fresh herbs such as basil, tarragon, and chives
instructions: Put all ingredients in a 4-quart heavy saucepan and bring to a boil over moderately high heat. Boil, uncovered, 20 minutes, then pour through a large fine-mesh sieve into a large bowl, pressing hard on and then discarding solids.
